checks.msg: AppArmor annotation missing. The annotation 'container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/release-name-collabora' should be added.

Capability "CHOWN" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-collabora.allow-capability-chown: SomeReason'.

Capability "FOWNER" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-collabora.allow-capability-fowner: SomeReason'.

Capability "MKNOD" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-collabora.allow-capability-mknod: SomeReason'.

Capability "SYS_CHROOT" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/release-name-collabora.allow-capability-sys-chroot: SomeReason'.
allowPrivilegeEscalation set to 'true'. It should be set to 'false'.
readOnlyRootFilesystem is set to 'false' in container SecurityContext. It should be set to 'true'.
